Rajai Pasar Indonesia, Oppo Buka Rahasia
07 Nov 2019, 17:05 by Tim - detikInet


Oppo Reno. Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Jakarta - Dalam laporan yang dirilis lembaga survei Canalys, Oppo kembali menempati posisi pertama dengan market share 23% pada kuartal III tahun ini. Walau mengalami penurunan 3% dari kuartal II 2019, Oppo tetap mencatatkan pertumbuhan dengan peningkatan tahun ke tahun sebesar 47%.Jadi apa rahasia Oppo dua kuartal berturut-turut ada di posisi satu? "Konsistensi dan produk fokus menjadi kunci bagaimana Oppo dapat bertahan di pasar," sebut Aryo Meidianto, PR Manajer Oppo Indonesia dalam keterangannya."Yang utama bagaimana kita dapat membuat produk yang sesuai dengan keinginan konsumen. Agaknya hal tersebut terpenuhi dengan perangkat A9 2020 dan Reno2 Series di kuartal 3 ini yang bisa menyasar kelas menengah hingga high end," lanjutnya.


Foto: istimewa

Ia menambahkan, upaya Oppo dalam meningkatkan market share pasar tanah air ditunjang dengan kehadiran perangkat baru A Series dan Reno2 Series. A Series baru yang disebut berusaha mendefinisikan kembali seri A agaknya mendapat sambutan yang sangat positif di pasar. "Keberadaan perangkat dengan spesifikasi yang sangat dibutuhkan masyarakat saat ini menjadi nilai tambah tersendiri mengapa perangkat ini mudah mengambil hati konsumen Indonesia. Terlebih pada kehadiran RAM besar 8GB pada rentan harga 4 jutaan," cetus Aryo.Sementara Reno2 Series berhasil menarik pasar yang berbeda. Bermain pada pasar premium high end, perangkat ini banyak mendapat sambutan dari segi desain, fitur dan spesifikasi yang dibawa. "Varian Reno2 F secara cepat dapat menarik perhatian kalangan kelas menengah berkat bahasa desain Reno series yang pertama kali dibawa di level harga 5 jutaan," imbuhnya.Seperti diberitakan sebelumnya, Canalys masih menempatkan Oppo di posisi pertama. Di peringkat kedua ada Xiaomi, menyusul kemudian Samsung, Vivo dan terakhir ada Realme. Simak Video "Resmi Dirilis, Berapa Harga OPPO Reno 2 Series? "[Gambas:Video 20detik](fyk/fyk)

Rajai Pasar Indonesia, Oppo Open Secrets
Nov 7 2019, 17:05 by Team - detikInet


Oppo Reno. Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

Jakarta - In a report released by the survey agency Canalys, Oppo returned to first place with a 23% market share in the third quarter of this year. Despite a 3% decline from the second quarter of 2019, Oppo continued to record growth with a 47% year-on-year increase. So is Oppo's secret two consecutive quarters in position one? "Consistency and product focus are key to how Oppo can survive in the market," said Aryo Meidianto, PR Manager of Oppo Indonesia in his statement. "Series in the third quarter can target the middle to high end classes," he continued.


Photo: special

He added, Oppo's efforts to increase market share in the homeland market were supported by the presence of new A Series and Reno2 Series devices. The new A Series which is called trying to redefine the A series seems to get a very positive response in the market. "The existence of a device with specifications that are needed by the public at this time is an added value why this device is easy to win the hearts of Indonesian consumers. Especially in the presence of 8GB of large RAM at a price of 4 million vulnerable," said Aryo. While Reno2 Series managed to attract a different market. Playing on the high-end premium market, this device has received a lot of welcome in terms of design, features and specifications carried. "The Reno2 F variant can quickly attract the attention of the middle class thanks to the Reno series design language, which was first brought at the price level of 5 million," he added. As reported earlier, Canalys still puts Oppo in the first position. In the second place is Xiaomi, followed by Samsung, Vivo and finally Realme.
